Interface playn.core.GroupLayer

Changed Methods
void add(Layer) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Adds a layer to the bottom of the group.
void addAt(Layer, float, float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Adds the supplied layer to this group layer, adjusting its translation (relative to this group layer) to the supplied values.
void clear() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Use {@link #removeAll}.
void destroyAll() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Removes and destroys all child layers from this group.
Layer get(int) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the layer at the specified index.
void remove(Layer) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Removes a layer from the group.
void removeAll() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Removes all child layers from this group.
int size() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the number of layers in this group.
